name: MIDNIGHT MICE
description:
This is game #3 of my 12 Games in 12 Months Challenge I've set for myself in 2023. The Soundtrack for this game was created by Munkie Beets, go check him out!

The Midnight Mice are an elite group entrusted with the task of tracking down and collecting the legendary substance known as twilight cheese. But they are not the only ones who desire this mystical prize. 

Legend has it that the black cats were once the guardians of this land, but were cursed by their greed. So they fly, desperately searching for the one thing that can cure their insatiable hunger.

Controls:

Use WASD or the ARROW KEYS to move

Press SPACE, SHIFT, or ENTER to dash
